title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Open Information Literacy and Academic Communication Skills Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Academic Resource Searching and Digital Device Utilization Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three credible scientific sources aligned with their research topic using open-access materials.
Learners can perform peer review and feedback processes according to academic communication principles.
Learners can create practical project reports applying Open Educational Resources (OER) using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
